title: Shibli grieved over demise of Professor Mughees
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 24 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Senator Shibli Faraz on Wednesday expressed deep sorrow and grief over the sad demise of Prof. Dr. Mugheesuddin Sheikh.
In a statement, the minister said that today the nation lost a great teacher of journalism.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to rest his soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear this loss with fortitude.
